Header: SLCMP Troops Take over Ceremonial Duties at President’s House
Content: The change-over of the ceremonial guard at the President’s House and the Temple Trees took place this morning (1) during a symbolic ceremony in front of the President’s House at Colombo-Fort. During the formal ceremony, Sri Lanka Corps of Military Police (SLCMP) took over their ceremonial duties from the Sri Lanka Air Force for a period of six months, beginning 1 April 2019. After signing formal documents to that effect, both Sri Lanka Corps of Military Police and Air Force troops exchanged greetings.
